verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> died, Tola <S%H8439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Puah, <S%H6312><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo, <S%H1734><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he lived <S%H3427><s%> in Shamir <S%H8069><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>
And he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty-three years. <S%H8141><s%> Then he died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Shamir. <S%H8069><s%>
And after <S%H310><s%> him, Jair <S%H2971><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty-two years. <S%H8141><s%>

And he had <S%H1961><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> who rode <S%H7392><s%> on thirty <S%H7970><s%> donkeys, <S%H5895><s%> and they had thirty <S%H7970><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> that are called <S%H7121><s%> Havvoth-jair to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
And Jair <S%H2971><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Kamon. <S%H7056><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals <S%H1168><s%> and the Ashtaroth, <S%H9441><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of Aram, <S%H758><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> thus they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and did not serve <S%H5647><s%> Him.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and He sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And they afflicted <S%H7492><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that year; <S%H8141><s%> for eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> they [afflicted] all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites. <S%H567><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> against Judah, <S%H3063><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> so that Israel <S%H3478><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> distressed. <S%H9503><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> out to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against Thee, for indeed, we have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals. <S%H1168><s%>"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "[Did I] not [deliver you] from the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>?

"Also when the Sidonians, <S%H6722><s%> the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> and the Maonites <S%H4584><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you, you cried <S%H6817><s%> out to Me, and I delivered <S%H3467><s%> you from their hands. <S%H3027><s%>
"Yet you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Me and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods; <S%H430><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will deliver <S%H3467><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%>

"Go <S%H1980><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> out to the gods <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have chosen; <S%H977><s%> let them deliver <S%H3467><s%> you in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your distress. <S%H6869><s%>"

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "We have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to us whatever <S%H3605><s%> seems good <S%H2896><s%> to Thee; only <S%H389><s%> please <S%H4994><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> us this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>"

So they put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> them, and served <S%H5647><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and He could <S%H9527><s%> bear <S%H9527><s%> the misery <S%H5999><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> no <S%H9527><s%> longer. <S%H9527><s%>

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were summoned, <S%H6817><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilead. <S%H1568><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> together, and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Mizpah. <S%H4709><s%>

And the people, <S%H5971><s%> the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> will begin <S%H2490><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>? He shall become <S%H1961><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>"
